item.title: ╚»★RevealedX V3★«╝ [Development]-[Apply within]
item.dc:creator: @TheAmmoBandit TheAmmoBandit
item.description:
@TheAmmoBandit wrote:

[quote=“I am beast, post:1, topic:432234”][left]

reveal10.png1024×200
[/left]
[center]
Welcome to the RevealedX V2 Development thread. Please read thoroughly before applying.

[u]Information about RevealedX:
We are taking a step back in the private server process and we are taking on a whole new outlook at RevealedX. I have recently just got back into dealing with private servers and I wanted to take a fresh start with a fresh base. We are looking forward to you becoming part of the team, but please make sure you understand the basic idea of the server itself before applying.

[u]Server Goals:
• Create the most stable server possible.
• Create one of the best economys known to exist.
• Create a large dedicated player base.
• Add features that have never been seen before.
• Create a genuinley coded server.
• Create a staff member base that genuinely loves the game and knows how to handle problems.

Information about the Raid System
The raid system is quite simple in essence. It is composed of five different raids, the first unlocking the second, the second unlocking the third, and so forth. Upon entering each raid, you must kill 20 of the selected NPCS to unlock access to the raid boss.

The raid system is color coded meaning:
Green = Easy
Yellow = Medium
Red = Difficult
(Media displayed below)

[u]Server Features:
• Full summoning with BoB.
• Fully re-done Dungeoneering System, with 5 floors.
• Decent player base.
• Terminated most memory leaks.
• Added 3 bosses that most servers overlook. (Mutant-Tarn, Sea Troll Queen, Barrelchest)
• Added a raiding system.
• Custom ::yelltag’s
• All 614 Items
• 525 Models
• Added an efficient Activity Points System.
• Spirit Shield effects.
• Re-did NpcDrops using an event manager.
• Added 2 additional Donator Ranks
• Added new DH system with a manager.
• All extreme potions
• Overloads
• Rocktail effects
• Fixed prayer draining.
• Quick Prayers
• Added special restore potions as well as super prayer potions
• Re-did Godwars.
• Rs hit fades
• Rs Korasi special attack
• Fixed models going through players
• ‘Face North’
• Loyalties
• A LOT MORE!


[u]----------Media----------

Raid Media


raid1.jpg757×497

raid2.jpg759×499

raid3.jpg762×500

raid4.jpg759×497

raid5.jpg759×497

MORE MEDIA TO COME!!!

Positions Available:

[u]Server Programmer (0/2) -
A user who is knowleged in the generality of coding the source itself. Must be an
experienced coder with a decent amount of capability. Must work a minimum of 1 hour a
day, with no maximum.

[u]Forum Programmer (0/1) -
A user who is knowleged in the generality of coding the forum and site itself. Must be an
experienced coder with a decent amount of capability. Must work a minimum of 30 minutes a
day, with no maximum.

[u]Videographer (0/1) -
A user who is knowleged and skilled with making videos of updates, as well as tutorials for the server. Must be able to output at least 1 good video a week.

[u]Client Programmer (0/1) -
A user who is knowleged in the generality of coding the client itself. Must be an
experienced coder, with a decent amount of capability. Must work a minimum of 1 hour a
day, with no maximum.

[u]Forum Moderator (0/2) -
A user who:

  • Works well with other users
  • Creates simple as well as complex guides to help other users
  • Manages forums well
  • Creates a clean and safe environment for all users
  • Is able to punish other users
  • A user who does not take preference
    Must work a minimum of 2 hours a day, with no maximum.

[u]In-game Moderator (0/2) -
A user who:

  • Works well with other users
  • Creates simple as well as complex guides to help other users
  • Manages game well
  • Must agree to and abide by the Handbook that will be given upon acception
  • Creates a clean and safe environment for all users
  • Is able to punish other users
  • A user who does not take preference
    Must work a minimum of 3-4 hours a day, with no maximum.

[u]Beta Tester (0/2) -
A user who:

  • Works well with other users
  • Knows the game
  • Is able to recognize bugs within the server
  • Is available

Application Format:

Name: IGN: Age: Position applying for: Secondary Position if not chosen for the first position: Hours Available: Time Zone: Experience: Proof of Work(if applies): Capability with Coding(if applies): MSN: Skype (optional): Other contact (optional):[/center][/quote]Name: Michaël
IGN: Infection_Z
Age: 16
Position applying for: Webdesign/developer - Forum Dev
Secondary Position if not chosen for the first position: GFX Designer
Hours Available: 1-5 Hours, depends on the day
Time Zone: GMT+1 Brussels
Experience: 2 years of freelance website design + coding, currently in school following ‘Multimedia and Webdesign’ (my 4th year now), if you want a forum based website, i know how to do this (this doesn’t need experience FFS…)+ [i know how to secure all kinds of forum software to prevent DDoS, iSQL injection]
Proof of Work(if applies): No sites atm, just started a new website wich hasn’t anything on it. http://www.iphwned.com
Capability with Coding(if applies): HTML, CSS, PHP
MSN: Given when PM’ed
Skype (optional): TheAmmoBandit
Other contact (optional):
